joinMsg: Welcome to the Villoux Server System's Discord server!  Before formally joining our server, please take a moment to read our Discord Server Welcome Message on our website at: http://www.villoux.com/villouxs-discord-server.html  Once you have finished reading the welcome, you will know how to verify yourself and begin using the server.  If you have any difficulties following the instructions in the message, please contact the Executive Discord Operator, Cronus at cronus@villoux.com  Thank you in advance for your cooperation and we look forward to playing with you soon!
